backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing course enrollment system with role-based access control, managing students, marketers, and courses (basic, advanced, super) with user profiles and permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: management team names in footer, WhatsApp contact in footer, and unique course images with high confidence test coverage.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing components, pages, hooks, and utilities for the midbrain activation course marketing application.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining OKLCH color system variables for light/dark themes with warm orange/amber educational palette and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Midbrain Activation Course Marketing App with root div and module script loader.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component managing authentication flow with Internet Identity, profile setup modal for new users, and role-based layout rendering with loading states.
frontend/src/components/AllMarketersView: Management dashboard component displaying marketer performance rankings, referral statistics, and top performer metrics in a sortable table with summary cards.
frontend/src/components/CourseList.tsx: Displays a grid of all available courses with enrollment functionality, showing course images, descriptions, and enrollment status with loading skeletons and empty states.
frontend/src/components/CourseManagement: Management view showing a table of all courses with enrollment statistics and active status badges, calculating enrollment counts per course from student data.
Displays a grid of courses the current user is enrolled in with course images, descriptions, and active enrollment badges.
frontend/src/components/EnrollmentAnalyt: Dashboard component showing enrollment statistics with summary cards and charts (bar chart and pie chart) visualizing enrollment data across courses using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/MarketerStats.ts: Profile management card for marketers allowing them to view and edit their name with inline editing functionality.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Top navigation header displaying the app logo, user role, username, and logout button with role-based portal labeling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for new users to set up their profile by entering their name and selecting a role (Student, Management, or Marketer).
Layout component that renders role-specific dashboards (Student, Management, or Marketer) based on user profile, with a navigation header and footer containing contact information and attribution.
frontend/src/components/StudentList.tsx: Displays a searchable table of all enrolled students with their course enrollments, showing student names, enrolled courses as badges, and total enrollment counts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout functionality, managing AuthClient lifecycle and identity state with delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including user profiles, courses, students, and marketers, with mutations that show toast notifications and invalidate relevant queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for theming (light and dark modes) using an orange-based color scheme for the Midbrain Academy application.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/ManagementDashboard.t: Management dashboard displaying overview statistics (courses, students, enrollments, referrals) and tabbed views for analytics, course management, student lists, and marketer performance.
frontend/src/pages/MarketerDashboard.tsx: Marketer dashboard page displaying referral statistics (total referrals, performance status, marketer name) with a button to track new referrals and a MarketerStats component.
frontend/src/pages/StudentDashboard.tsx: Student dashboard page showing course statistics (available, enrolled, remaining courses) with tabs to switch between enrolled courses and available courses for enrollment.
frontend/src/utils/courseImages.ts: Utility function that maps course IDs (basic, advanced, super) to their corresponding image paths in the assets/generated folder.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: URL parameter utilities for extracting query parameters from both regular and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence and cleanup functions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH, extended border radius, Inter font family, custom shadows, and accordion animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking for Midbrain Activation course app with three completed features: management team names in footer, WhatsApp contact, and course-specific images.
